1.caption_en:
A slide defining a platform as a multi-sided, sustainable business model that connects two or more groups to find, interact, exchange and co-create. It highlights stakeholders (Consumers, Producers, Partners, Owner, Society & Planet) arranged around a central platform and emphasizes value creation and long-term sustainability.

{
  "artifact_type": "slide",
  "title": "Platforms ... A multi-sided & sustainable business model",
  "summary": "Defines a platform as a business that creates positive impact by connecting two or more groups to find, interact, exchange and co-create, leveraging network engagement, data intelligence and infrastructure for long-term sustainability.",
  "definition_quote": "A business that creates a positive impact for its users, society and our planet. It operates a physical or virtual place to help two or more different groups to find, interact, exchange & co-create with each other.",
  "bullets": [
    "find",
    "interact",
    "exchange & co-create"
  ],
  "diagram": {
    "center_label": "PLATFORM",
    "groups": [
      "Consumers",
      "Producers",
      "Partners",
      "Owner",
      "Society & Planet"
    ],
    "connections": [
      {
        "from": "Consumers",
        "to": "Producers",
        "label": "Value",
        "arrow": "bidirectional"
      }
    ],
    "icons": {
      "Consumers": "user silhouettes",
      "Producers": "factory",
      "Partners": "chain link",
      "Owner": "single person",
      "Society & Planet": "leaf"
    },
    "colors": {
      "Consumers": "coral",
      "Producers": "teal",
      "Partners": "yellow",
      "Owner": "light blue",
      "Society & Planet": "lime green",
      "ring": "light gray"
    },
    "layout": "circular ring with stakeholder nodes around central platform"
  },
  "author": "Platform Innovation Kit Team",
  "footer": "Platform Innovation Kit",
  "language": "English",
  "visual_style": "flat design, pastel colored circles, minimal text, two-column layout (text left, diagram right)"
}

3.caption_en:
Circular platform diagram with "PLATFORM" at the center and five colored stakeholder circles (Consumers, Producers, Partners, Owner, Society & Planet) arranged around it; bidirectional "Value" arrows connect Consumers and Producers.

{
  "artifact_type": "infographic",
  "layout": "circular",
  "central_element": {
    "label": "PLATFORM",
    "shape": "circle",
    "color": "#FFFFFF",
    "position": "center"
  },
  "ring": {
    "label": "Value",
    "shape": "donut",
    "color": "#CFCFCF",
    "position": "around_center"
  },
  "nodes": [
    {
      "id": "consumers",
      "label": "Consumers",
      "color": "#E07B73",
      "icon": "people",

    },
    {

      "label": "Producers",

      "icon": "factory",
      "position": "top-right"
    },
    {

      "label": "Partners",
      "color": "#F4B62A",
      "icon": "link",
      "position": "middle-left"
    },
    {
      "id": "society_planet",
      "label": "Society & Planet",
      "color": "#B4D54A",
      "icon": "leaf",
      "position": "middle-right"
    },
    {
      "id": "owner",
      "label": "Owner",
      "color": "#62C5EE",
      "icon": "person",
      "position": "bottom-center"
    }
  ],
  "connections": [
    {
      "from": "consumers",
      "to": "producers",
      "type": "bidirectional",
      "visual": "two dark grey curved arrows",
      "label": "Value"
    }
  ],
  "text_strings": [
    "Consumers",
    "Producers",
    "Partners",
    "Owner",
    "Society & Planet",
    "PLATFORM",
    "Value"
  ],
  "style": "flat vector, minimal iconography, pastel color palette",
  "notes": "Each stakeholder node is a colored circle with a white icon; central platform sits inside a grey ring labeled 'Value'."
}
